publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-320 Jackie Baillie: Chivas Brothers’ Investment in Scotland—That the Parliament welcomes the investment made by Chivas Brothers to upgrade their bottling plants in Dumbarton and Paisley with an injection of £4.75 million; notes that the Scottish Executive provided a Regional Selective Assistance grant of £950,000 that will help to ensure that the high-quality operations taking place at these locations will now continue long into the future, and congratulates the workforce for ensuring that Chivas maintains its competitiveness in the world market. Supported by: Mr Frank McAveety*, Ken Macintosh*, John Park*, Mary Mulligan*, Pauline McNeill*, Sarah Boyack*
